title: The California Employment Development Department (EDD) is about to garnish my wages what are my options to fight this
question: I am a CA resident. I owe approx 5k to EDD for overpayments. They have filed a judgement to garnish my wages. What if any are my options?
answers: Impossible to answer your question without knowing a lot more about your financial situation. Make up a listing of all your debt (name of creditor and amount owed) a listing of your assets and a budget showing what you make on a monthly basis as well as your monthly expenses. Then contact a bankruptcy attorney in your area for a free consultation. He/she will be able to tell you how to best deal with this debt relative to your entire financial situation. Good luck.
